definition: to emit/to give off/to send out (or up, forth)/to brave/to face/reckless/to falsely adopt (sb's identity etc)/to feign/(literary) to cover
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: And in fact, that colon is important, so let me stress this over here.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，这个冒号很重要，让我把这里强调下。

sentences.english: The colon's identifying a block of code.
sentences.chinese: 冒号意味着一段代码的开始，这里的意思就是。

sentences.english: Also note that there is a space character after the colon.
sentences.chinese: 还请注意在冒号后面有一个空白字符。

sentences.english: The colon separates the hostname from the display name.
sentences.chinese: 冒号将主机名与显示器名称分隔开。

sentences.english: For a prefixed name, the local part is what comes after the colon.
sentences.chinese: 对于有前缀的名称，本地部分是冒号之后的部分。

sentences.english: Stay away from the use of colons in greetings and closings and use commas instead.
sentences.chinese: 在问候词以及结尾用逗号代替冒号。

sentences.english: In this case you only use the characters after the colon.
sentences.chinese: 在这个示例中，只使用冒号后面的字符。

sentences.english: It's, and in particular, the colon is the start, and the carriage return is the end.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是，冒号是开始，回车意味着这块指令集的结束。

sentences.english: A colon indents a line or paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 冒号开头代表新的一行或一段前空格。

sentences.english: Here, too, the lon must be followed by a sh.
sentences.chinese: 这里也一样，应当在冒号之后加破折号。

sentences.english: Typically the path is colon-separated but this depends on the operating system.
sentences.chinese: 通常该目录以冒号分隔，不过这取决于操作系统。

sentences.english: You can use namespaces by using a colon in the pagename.
sentences.chinese: 你能通过在页面名称中的一个冒号使用名字空间。

sentences.english: So, here are 5 reasons why you should use a colon cleanse system.
sentences.chinese: 因此，这里有5个原因你应该使用一个冒号净化系统。

sentences.english: The furore obscured what Mr Schäffler was proposing: lease, commercial sale or a transfer of sovereignty.
sentences.chinese: 冒号后面，我理解的是主权的租赁，商业销售和移交。

sentences.english: The text can be indented using one or more colons , at the beginning of a line .
sentences.chinese: 在行首使用一个或者更多的冒号可以实现缩进效果。

sentences.english: The semicolon separates each of the parts.

definition: dash/Chinese dash ── (punct., double the length of the western dash)
blank/blank space on a form/space/囗 (indicating missing or illegible character)
Chinese back-sloping comma 、 (punct. used to separate items in a list)
Chinese guillemet 《》(punct. used for names of books etc)
